name: Glossy Balls
description:
Experience this fun casual game where you tap the balls to pop them up. Let's dive into the unique, addictive and immersive game play offered by the game. Just warm up your fingers and start tapping over moving balls to pop them up, open buckets full of glossy balls, freeze them, gain power ups, avoid hazards and so much more fun to play game elements

The Game offers:

* 25 levels of fun game play
* Boss level
* Addictive Power Ups
* More levels and upgrades to be added in next few updates

So, what are you waiting for? Grab the game for free and have fun. Let's see if you can defeat a boss at level 25 in one go.

* Google Play and the Google Play logo are trademarks of Google LLC.
